result.eng: We will have to examine the case again.
result.ga: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.orig: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.html: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arísWe will have to examine the case again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn breaṫnú ar an ċás arísWe will have to examine the case again.

result.eng: The author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ga: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.orig: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.html: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leithThe author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ponchtml: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do ċás ar leiṫThe author makes a reference to a specific case.

result.eng: In case of emergency, break the glass.
result.ga: I gcás práinne bris an ghloine
result.orig: I gcás práinne bris an ghloine
result.html: I gcás práinne bris an ghloineIn case of emergency, break the glass.
result.ponchtml: I gcás práinne bris an ġloineIn case of emergency, break the glass.

result.html: I gcás timpisteIn case of accident.
result.ponchtml: I gcás timpisteIn case of accident.

result.eng: It is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ga: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.orig: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.html: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ponchtml: Is aṁlaiḋ go ndearna an Taoiseaċ roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ga: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.orig: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.html: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ponchtml: Más aṁlaiḋ go ḃfuil na páirtiṫe sásta cuṁaċt a roinnt beiḋ coṁrialtas ann sul i ḃfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: Don't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ga: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.orig: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.html: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ponchtml: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roiṁ an ainmḟocal sa ċás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.

result.eng: He referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.
result.ga: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shin
result.orig: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shin
result.html: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shinHe referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ṫagair sé do ċás a ṫarla daiċead bliain ó ẛinHe referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.
